          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of diamond and graphite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur des Diamanten und des Graphits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure de diamant et de graphite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura do diamante e da grafita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura del diamante e della grafite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή του διαμαντιού και του γραφίτη</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the structures of diamond and graphite where covalent bonds are present.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Strukturen des 
Diamanten und Graphit, wo kovalente Bindungen anwesend sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les structures du diamant et 
graphite où les obligations covalentes sont présentes.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostram as estruturas do diamante e
a grafita onde as ligações covalent estão atuais.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra le strutture del diamante e

και του γραφίτη όπου οι ομοιοπολικοί δεσμοί είναι παρόντες.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra las estructuras del diamante
